title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Boost and affirm your self-worth by rewarding yourself today. Maybe you resolve a major problem at work, paving your way to becoming an employee of the month. Or, you simply make a yummy breakfast after reluctantly rolling out of bed. Youre always valuable and worthy of love. Although you cant buy respect, your gesture of kindness symbolizes how you give love to yourself. Treating yourself nicely is a wonderful example for everyone else to follow. Sweet acts of generosity are contagious. Buddha taught, You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
